title: WHATWG
summary: The WHATWG (Web Hypertext Application Technology Working Group) is a community that maintains and develops web standards, including DOM, Fetch, and HTML. Employees of Apple, Mozilla, and Opera established WHATWG in 2004.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
